descriptors.name: wisun_node_monitoring_scrc
descriptors.label: Wi-SUN Node Monitoring Application SCRC
descriptors.description: FOR SCRC : This node monitoring example project provides a CoAP application to monitor Wi-SUN devices and update them using OTA DFU. It can be expanded to retrieve sensor values and set actuators
